00023 #ifndef QUEUE_H
00024 #define QUEUE_H
00025 
00026 #include "system.h"
00027 #include <stddef.h>
00028 #include "pthread-wrapper.h"
00029 #include "alloc-pool.h"
00030 
00032 typedef struct queue_node_def
00033 {
00034   struct queue_node_def *next;  
00035   char data[1];                 
00036 } *queue_node;
00037 
00039 typedef struct queue_def
00040 {
00041   pthread_mutex_t *mutex;       
00042   pthread_cond_t non_empty;     
00043   alloc_pool pool;              
00044   unsigned int nelem;           
00045   unsigned int size;            
00046   queue_node first;             
00047   queue_node last;              
00048   volatile bool exiting;        
00049 } queue;
00050 
00051 extern void queue_create (queue *q, size_t size, size_t num,
00052                           pthread_mutex_t *mutex);
00053 extern void queue_destroy (queue *q);
00054 extern void queue_put (queue *q, void *elem);
00055 extern bool queue_get (queue *q, void *elem);
00056 extern void queue_exiting (queue *q);
00057 
00058 #endif
